trans-unit.source: Password must have at least 10 characters
trans-unit.target: 密码必须至少有 10 个字符

trans-unit.source: Forgot your password? Click here to reset it.
trans-unit.target: 忘记密码了吗？点击 这里 重置它。

trans-unit.source: Sorry! Something went wrong. Please click here to try again. If the problem persists please contact us.
trans-unit.target: 对不起！出了问题。请点击 这里 再试一次。如果问题仍然存在，请 联系我们。

trans-unit.source: Forgot your password? Click here to reset it.
trans-unit.target: 忘记密码了吗？点击 这里 重置它。

trans-unit.source: Don't have an account? Click here to register.
trans-unit.target: 没有账户吗？点击 这里 注册。

trans-unit.source: There was a problem processing the request. Please contact us quoting code .
trans-unit.target: 处理请求时出现问题。请 联系我们 引用代码 .

trans-unit.source: Please check your email, if an account has been registered with it then a password reset link has been sent.
trans-unit.target: 请检查您的电子邮件，如果已注册账户，则已发送密码重置链接。

trans-unit.source: Sorry! Something went wrong. Please click here to try again. If the problem persists please contact us.
trans-unit.target: 对不起！出了问题。请点击 这里 再试一次。如果问题仍然存在，请 联系我们。

trans-unit.source: Your email has not yet been confirmed. Please check your email for the confirmation link, including in any spam folders. Please click here to resend the confirmation email.
trans-unit.target: 您的电子邮件尚未确认。请检查您的电子邮件以获取确认链接，包括在任何垃圾邮件文件夹中。请点击 这里 重新发送确认电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: The email '' is already confirmed or doesn't have an account associated with it. Please click here to login.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件 '' 已经确认或没有与之关联的账户。请点击 这里 登录。

trans-unit.source: New account created! Please click the link in your email to confirm your registration. Click here to login.
trans-unit.target: 新账户已创建！请单击您电子邮件中的链接以确认您的注册。点击 这里 登录。

trans-unit.source: There was a problem authenticating with Bitbucket.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Bitbucket 进行身份验证时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: There was a problem authenticating with GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GitHub 进行身份验证时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: There was a problem authenticating with GitLab.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GitLab 进行身份验证时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: There was a problem authenticating with Google.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Google 进行身份验证时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: Please click here to try again.
trans-unit.target: 请点击 这里 再试一次。

trans-unit.source: Click to manage payments or change the number of subscriptions
trans-unit.target: 单击以管理付款或更改订阅数量

trans-unit.source: You can buy subscriptions and assign them by email to other users (e.g. teammates)
trans-unit.target: 您可以购买订阅并通过邮箱登录将其分配给其他用户（例如队友）

trans-unit.source: Must be a positive integer less than 100
trans-unit.target: 必须是小于 100 的正整数

trans-unit.source: Click to purchase subscriptions that can be assigned to other users
trans-unit.target: 单击以购买可分配给其他用户的订阅

trans-unit.source: This subscription is due to expire. After expiry you may assign the subscription to another user
trans-unit.target: 此订阅即将到期。到期后，您可以将订阅分配给其他用户

trans-unit.source: Payment for this subscription has been paused

trans-unit.target: 输入用户的电子邮件地址...

trans-unit.source: Assign a subscription to this user
You have unassigned subscription. You can assign the remaining one, or cancel excess subscriptions by clicking the Manage Payments button and reducing the subscription quantity.
trans-unit.target: 你有 个 未分配的订阅。你可以分配剩下的一个，或通过点击“管理付款”按钮并减少订阅数量来取消多余的订阅。

trans-unit.source: There was a problem processing the request. Please email support at help@glint.info quoting code .
trans-unit.target: 处理请求时出现问题。请发送电子邮件至 help@glint.info 以提供支持代码 。

trans-unit.source: You have no payment details to manage. Please purchase a subscription first.
trans-unit.target: 您没有要管理的付款明细。请先购买订阅。

trans-unit.source: Unable to find available subscriptions, please check your payment settings are in working order by clicking the Manage Payments button above. If the problem persists email help@glint.info for support.
trans-unit.target: 无法找到可用的订阅，请单击上面的“管理付款”按钮检查您的付款设置是否正常。如果问题仍然存在，请发送电子邮件至 help@glint.info 寻求支持。

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your purchase! You will need to logout of Glint and back in again to activate.
trans-unit.target: 感谢您的购买！您需要注销 Glint 并重新登录才能激活。

trans-unit.source: Subscription assigned for ''. The user needs to logout of Glint and back in again to activate.
trans-unit.target: 为 '' 分配的订阅。用户需要注销 Glint 并重新登录才能激活。

trans-unit.source: Unassign subscription at the end of the billing period
trans-unit.target: 在结算期结束时取消分配订阅

trans-unit.source: Logged in successfully! You should now be redirected back to Glint.
trans-unit.target: 登录成功！您现在应该被重定向回 Glint。

trans-unit.source: If that didn't work, you can paste this authorization code into Glint directly:
trans-unit.target: 如果这不起作用，您可以将此授权码直接粘贴到 Glint 中：

trans-unit.source: Please click here to try again. If the problem persists please contact us.
trans-unit.target: 请点击 这里 再试一次。如果问题仍然存在，请 联系我们。

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your purchase, your subscription is now active! You will need to logout of Glint and back in again to start enjoying the premium benefits.
trans-unit.target: 感谢您的购买，您的订阅现已激活！您需要注销 Glint 并重新登录才能开始享受高级功能。
注册以兑换您的优惠券

trans-unit.source: Already have an account? Click here to login.
trans-unit.target: 已经有账户吗？点击 这里 登录。

trans-unit.source: Sign Up for a referral account to start earning rewards! Earn 25% of subscriptions you refer.
trans-unit.target: 注册一个推荐账户以开始赚取奖励！赚取您推荐的订阅的 25%。

trans-unit.source: You will be accredited when a user signs up using this link.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用此链接注册时，您将获得认可。

trans-unit.source: There was a problem processing the request. Please email support at help@glint.info
trans-unit.target: 处理请求时出现问题。请发送电子邮件至 help@glint.info 支持

trans-unit.source: Sorry! You are not authorized to view this page. Click here to login.
trans-unit.target: 对不起！您无权查看此页面。点击 这里 登录。

trans-unit.source: By downloading and using Glint, you agree to the license agreement, terms of service and privacy policy. © Logic Over Snacks Ltd.
trans-unit.target: 下载和使用 Glint，即表示您同意 许可协议、服务条款 和 隐私政策。 © Logic Over Snacks Ltd.

trans-unit.source: Glint: A Graphical Interface for Git
Please enter a valid security code
Email confirmed! You can now close this window and login to Glint.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件已确认！您现在可以关闭此窗口并登录 Glint。

trans-unit.source: This security code has expired. Please click here to request a new one.
trans-unit.target: 此安全码已过期。请点击 这里 请求一个新的。

trans-unit.source: This security code is invalid, please try again, or confirm your email address to request a new code:
trans-unit.target: 此安全码无效，请重试，或确认您的电子邮件地址以申请新密码：

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid email address
trans-unit.target: 请输入有效的电子邮件地址

trans-unit.source: Please enter a strong password with these rules:
trans-unit.target: 请输入符合以下规则的强密码：

trans-unit.source: Password changed! You can now close this window and login to Glint.
trans-unit.target: 密码已更改！您现在可以关闭此窗口并登录 Glint。

trans-unit.source: This site uses cookies from Google to deliver its services and to analyze traffic.
trans-unit.target: 本网站使用 Google 的 cookie 来提供服务和分析流量。
用户界面-拉取请求视图

trans-unit.source: Get it from the Snap Store
Is Glint free to use for commercial projects?
trans-unit.target: Glint 是否可以免费用于商业项目？

trans-unit.source: Yes, you only need to pay if you want the premium features.
trans-unit.target: 是的，只有你想要 高级功能 才需要付钱。

trans-unit.source: What operating systems does Glint work on?
trans-unit.target: Glint 在哪些操作系统上工作？

trans-unit.source: Windows, macOS, and Linux. Only x64 systems and Apple M1 (arm64) are supported. The application is designed for use on desktop computers, and so there is no version available for mobile devices or web browsers. The playground is a partially working online version that you can try without downloading the app.
trans-unit.target: Windows、macOS 和 Linux。仅支持 x64 和 Apple M1 (arm64) 操作系统。该应用程序专为在台式计算机上使用而设计，因此没有适用于移动设备或网络浏览器的版本。这 测试环境 是一个部分可用的在线版本，您无需下载该应用程序即可试用。

trans-unit.source: Can I use Glint on multiple computers?
trans-unit.target: 我可以在多台计算机上使用 Glint 吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes, licenses are per user so you can use a single subscription on multiple devices, just log in with the same account.
trans-unit.target: 是的，许可证是按用户计算的，因此您可以在多台设备上使用单个订阅，只需使用同一账户登录即可。

trans-unit.source: Do I need to install any dependencies?
trans-unit.target: 我需要安装任何依赖项吗？

trans-unit.source: In most cases no, but check the installation docs for details.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下没有，但检查 安装文档 了解详情。

trans-unit.source: Can I purchase subscriptions for team members?
trans-unit.target: 我可以为团队成员购买订阅吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can purchase multiple subscriptions and assign them to other users on the account page. You don't need to have your own subscription to do this.
trans-unit.target: 是的，您可以购买多个订阅并将它们分配给 账户 页。你不需要拥有自己的订阅来完成这个操作。
你们的退款政策是什么？

trans-unit.source: All payments are non-refundable, but you can cancel your subscription at any time. Upon cancellation, you will still receive the premium benefits until the end of your billing period.
trans-unit.target: 所有付款均不可退还，但您可以随时取消订阅。取消后，您仍将获得高级功能，直到您的账单期结束。

trans-unit.source: Use up to two tabs simultaneously
trans-unit.target: 最多同时使用两个选项卡
具有完整语法突出显示的差异
跨文件更改和提交搜索

trans-unit.source: Perform complex tasks without breaking a sweat.

trans-unit.target: 跨文件更改和提交搜索

trans-unit.source: Enjoy a smooth, effortless experience built from the ground up to run fast.
trans-unit.target: 从底层开始构建，提供流畅、无压力的体验。

trans-unit.source: See the features page for more details.
trans-unit.target: 见 特征 页面了解更多详情。
所有基本功能完全免费

trans-unit.source: No time limits or trial periods
trans-unit.target: 没有时间限制或试用期限制

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to Premium for bonus features and to support development
trans-unit.target: 升级到高级版以获得奖励功能并支持开发

trans-unit.source: Sorry! The page you are looking for does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 对不起！您正在寻找的页面不存在。

trans-unit.source: Note: certain features are disabled and will do nothing - don't worry they will be available in the downloaded app!
trans-unit.target: 注意：某些功能已禁用且将不起作用 - 不要担心，它们将在下载的应用程序中提供！

trans-unit.source: Your device is too small to use the playground.
trans-unit.target: 因为您的设备太小所以无法使用测试环境。

trans-unit.source: Try opening this page on a desktop computer to play with the demo.
trans-unit.target: 请尝试在桌面电脑上打开此页面以使用演示功能。

trans-unit.source: Refunds are offered for any reason within the first 30 days of purchase. After 30 days, no refunds are offered of any kind.
trans-unit.target: 在购买的前30天内，无论任何原因，都可以退款。30 天后，将不提供任何形式的退款。

trans-unit.source: To initiate a refund, send an email to: help@glint.info
trans-unit.target: 要发起退款，请发送电子邮件至：help@glint.info
